issue.message: Resource named '`overlay`' does not start with the project's resource prefix '`MaterialRefreshLayout`'; rename to '`MaterialRefreshLayoutOverlay`' ?
issue.explanation: In Gradle projects you can specify a resource prefix that all resources in the project must conform to. This makes it easier to ensure that you don't accidentally combine resources from different libraries, since they all end up in the same shared app namespace.

issue.message: Expected a color resource id (`R.color.`) but received an RGB integer
issue.explanation: Ensures that resource id's passed to APIs are of the right type; for example, calling `Resources.getColor(R.string.name)` is wrong.
